name: Investing Life - Stock Simulator
description:
Can you climb the HIGH STAKES ladder of PORTFOLIO MANAGEMENT? Millions are in YOUR HANDS as you navigate turbulent markets, drive MASSIVE returns and CASH in on PAYDAYS!

-----------------------------------

INVESTING LIFE is the ONLY AD FREE investment management simulator on the AppStore. Client's put their faith and money in your hands - what are you going to do?


You just graduated and are about to kickoff your career managing a small investment portfolio.

• Buy, sell and trade as you chase annual TARGETS that PAYOUT commission and bonuses.
• Hire ANALYSTS to run simulations and PREDICT the future stock price
• Grow your STAKE in companies until you are the MAJORITY shareholder
• VOTE on motions put forth by the company's BOARD OF DIRECTORS
• Monitor news sources for events that impact SECTORS and COMPANIES
• Get tips from INSIDERS...but for a PRICE
• Buy PRIVATE JETS and MANSIONS as you become the WORLD's most sought after FUND MANAGER
• Build your RESUME and grow your NETWORK to your next job offer.
• Climb the social LADDER to manage larger, MILLION dollar funds
• Compete on GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
